document_data.name: Zaynal
document_data.mainbody: '''Zaynal''' was a [[Half-elf|half-elven ]] [[Sorcerer (kit)|sorcerer]] and scribe living in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Zaynal was a bit of a cheat and liar. When her scrivening business was slow, she enjoyed closing her shop, disguising herself with magic, and roaming the caravanserai and [[Warehouse District of Huzuz|Warehouse District]] selling false "relics" to foolish customers. Some of these items included chips of bone from the first [[Grand Caliph]], scraps of the original scrolls of the [[Loregiver]], and pieces of the [[House of the Loregiver]]. Zaynal used her skills to supply forged documents, all signed by [[Renn min Zann]], to authenticate her wares.
